User Story: As a user charging my vehicle, I want to receive push notifications about my charging session status, so that I can stay informed without keeping the app open
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Notifications for: session start, charging complete, unexpected stops, energy & cost summary. Work in background/closed state. Tapping opens app. Settings to enable/disable. Actionable buttons.
Technical Notes: Use Capacitor Push Notifications plugin, FCM for Android, APNs for iOS, Backend triggers on OCPP status changes
Dependencies: Backend API for device token registration, OCPP triggers

User Story: As a user managing my wallet, I want to receive push notifications about wallet transactions, so that I can stay informed about payments and balance
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Notifications for: successful recharge, failed recharge, low balance (<₹100), amount deducted. Include amount & balance. Settings to enable/disable.
Technical Notes: Reuse push infrastructure from US-001, Backend triggers on Razorpay webhooks and wallet changes

User Story: As a user searching for stations, I want to receive notifications when nearby stations become available, so that I can quickly find a charger
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Set alerts for favorite stations. Notifications when station available. Configurable radius (2km/5km/10km). Include station name, connectors, distance.
Technical Notes: Backend monitors charger status changes, User preferences for favorites and radius, Geofencing

User Story: As a user, I want to view all my past notifications in an in-app notification center, so that I can review missed notifications
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Notification list (last 30 days), Timestamp & read/unread status, Tap to navigate, Mark as read, Clear all, Badge with unread count, Pull-to-refresh
Technical Notes: Store locally with Capacitor Preferences, Sync with backend API, Auto-clear after 30 days

User Story: As a user with intermittent connectivity, I want to view recent sessions and wallet balance offline, so that I can access info without network
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Display cached transactions & balance offline, 'Offline Mode' indicator, Last sync timestamp, Outdated data message, Auto-sync on reconnect, Cached station locations
Technical Notes: Service worker, Capacitor Preferences or SQLite, Cache last 50 transactions, Network status detection

User Story: As a returning user, I want to log in using fingerprint or face recognition, so that I can access the app quickly and securely
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Enable biometric login in settings (opt-in), Support Face ID/Touch ID (iOS) and fingerprint/face unlock (Android), Prompt after first login, Fallback to Clerk auth
Technical Notes: Use Capacitor Biometric Auth plugin, Store encrypted session token securely, Handle availability check

User Story: As a frequent user, I want to save favorite stations for quick access, so that I can navigate to regular stations easily
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Mark stations as favorite, Dedicated favorites section, Real-time availability, Remove from favorites, Sync across devices, Home screen shows top 3, Map highlights favorites, Reorder favorites
Technical Notes: Backend API for saving/retrieving, Store user_id + station_id, Local cache for offline

User Story: As a user planning to charge, I want to schedule a charging session in advance, so that I can reserve a charger
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Select station/date/time/duration, Confirmation & reminder (15 min before), View/cancel scheduled sessions, Station shows 'Reserved', 15-min grace period, Notification if unavailable
Technical Notes: Backend reservation system, OCPP integration to lock/unlock, Time zone handling, Queue management

User Story: As a user with issues, I want to chat with customer support in the app, so that I can get help quickly
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Chat button on all screens, Send text & photos, Real-time responses, Chat history preserved, Push notifications for replies, Agent name & status, Pre-filled context, FAQ before live agent
Technical Notes: Integrate chat service (Intercom/Crisp/WebSocket), Backend API for message routing, Store transcripts

User Story: As a satisfied user, I want to refer friends and earn wallet credits, so that I can get rewarded
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Unique referral code, Share via share sheet, Enter code on signup, Referrer gets ₹100 (after first charge), New user gets ₹50, View referral stats, Push notification on use, Auto-credit to wallet, Terms displayed
Technical Notes: Backend tracks referrals, Razorpay/direct wallet credit, Fraud detection (self-referrals, same device)

User Story: As a non-English speaking user, I want to use the app in my preferred language, so that I can understand all features
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Support: English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Marathi. Language selection in settings. Auto-detect device language. All UI translated. Locale formatting. Notifications in user language. Persist & sync. RTL support future.
Technical Notes: Use i18next or react-intl, Translation files per language, Backend stores preference, Professional translation service

User Story: As a user tracking expenses, I want to export transaction history as PDF or CSV, so that I can maintain records
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Export from Sessions screen, Select date range, Choose PDF/CSV format, PDF includes details & branding, CSV includes all fields, Download to device, Share via share sheet
Technical Notes: Use react-pdf or pdfmake, JavaScript CSV generation, Capacitor Filesystem, Share API

User Story: As a cost-conscious user, I want to see time-based pricing, so that I can charge during off-peak hours and save money
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Station shows pricing tiers (peak/off-peak), Current time cost estimate, Different time estimates, 7-day pricing forecast calendar, Notification for off-peak, Time-based breakdown, Auto-schedule off-peak
Technical Notes: Backend manages dynamic pricing per station, Frontend calendar widget, Integration with scheduling

User Story: As a smart EV owner, I want to connect my vehicle to the app, so that the app can automatically manage charging
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Connect via OEM API (Tesla, Tata, MG), Display battery & range, Set charging target (80%/100%), Auto-stop at target, Set departure time, Show vehicle location, Low battery alert, Suggest nearby stations
Technical Notes: Integration with vehicle APIs, OAuth for authorization, Backend stores tokens securely, OCPP commands based on vehicle data

User Story: As an environmentally conscious user, I want to see my carbon footprint savings, so that I can understand my environmental impact
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Dashboard shows: CO2 saved (kg), Trees planted equivalent, Petrol car km equivalent. Monthly/yearly trends. Compare with community. Share on social media. Badges for milestones.
Technical Notes: Calculate: kWh * emission_factor vs petrol. Backend aggregates stats. Social sharing with graphics

User Story: As a driver on the go, I want to use voice commands, so that I can operate the app hands-free
Acceptance Criteria Summary: Voice trigger or button. Commands: start/stop charging, find station, check balance, show last session. Voice feedback. Siri & Google Assistant integration. Shortcuts. Hindi & English support.
Technical Notes: Capacitor Speech Recognition, Siri Shortcuts, Google Assistant Actions, NLP for parsing
